questions.question: Sachin Tendulkar has played in 6 different World Cups.
Kapil Dev was the captain when India won their first World Cup in 1983.
Clive Lloyd captained West Indies to victory in both 1975 and 1979 World Cups.
AB de Villiers holds the record for fastest World Cup century.
Wasim Akram was the leading wicket-taker in Pakistan's 1992 World Cup victory.
Ricky Ponting was the captain for all 3 of Australia's consecutive World Cup wins.
Martin Guptill holds the record for highest individual score in World Cup cricket.
Muttiah Muralitharan has taken more World Cup wickets than any other spinner.
Viv Richards never won a World Cup as captain.
Ben Stokes was the Player of the Final in England's 2019 World Cup victory.
